text.jpText:
数多くの名ウマ娘が想いを託し、
後進がそれを引き継いできた
連綿と続く継承の場『三女神像前』――
text.enText:
Countless Umamusume have come to the<n>Three
Goddesses statue to carry on the<n>dreams of
legends past, or to entrust<n>their own to those yet
to come.

text.jpText:
今日もまた、新たなウマ娘が
想いを継いで走り始める！
text.enText:
Today, those legacies spark inspiration<n>in yet
another new runner!
